example.eg: The site was used as a camp by many climbers.
example.egtrans: 许多登山者把这个地点当作宿营地。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 地点, 场所, 选址

example.eg: This site has been online for six years.
example.egtrans: 这个网站已经上线六年了。

example.eg: The construction site had a lot of construction vehicles.
example.egtrans: 这个建筑工地有很多建筑车辆。

example.eg: We decided to site it twenty miles from here.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 设置, 使在…位置, 使坐落于, 设立在

example.eg: Everyone has to report to the office before entering the building site.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不整洁的地方，邋遢的地方

dsense.name: campsite, campsite, camp site, camping site (UK)

example.eg: We're going back to the same campsite we stayed at last year.
example.egtrans: 我们还去去年的那个露营地。

example.eg: All persons on the construction site are required to wear hard hats.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 施工现场, 建筑工地
约会网站, 交友网站

dsense.name: internet site, also US: Internet site

example.eg: I am putting together an internet site for some African eco-guides so they can market themselves and their services to potential tourists.
My job involved working off-site four days a week.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在指定位置外, 现场之外地, 私下地

example.eg: My doctor has an x-ray lab on site.

example.eg: My office has an on-site gym.

example.eg: Due to the light weight of trailers, tornadoes often cause the most damage in trailer parks.

example.egtrans: 近来，许多电视广告都邀请观众访问自家公司的网站。
